scripts.update: AWS_PROFILE=${AWS_PROFILE:-default}; zip -r tweetBot.zip . && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name mtn-TweetBot --zip-file fileb://tweetBot.zip --region us-east-1 --profile $AWS_PROFILE && rm tweetBot.zip
scripts.start: AWS_PROFILE=${AWS_PROFILE:-default}; aws events enable-rule --name mtn-TweetBotSchedule-rule --profile $AWS_PROFILE --region us-east-1
scripts.prestart: AWS_PROFILE=${AWS_PROFILE:-default}; aws lambda invoke --function-name mtn-TweetBot lambda-output.json --profile $AWS_PROFILE --region us-east-1 && rm lambda-output.json
scripts.poststart: echo "Running: you must manually stop" && exit 0
scripts.stop: AWS_PROFILE=${AWS_PROFILE:-default}; aws events disable-rule --name mtn-TweetBotSchedule-rule --profile $AWS_PROFILE --region us-east-1
scripts.poststop: echo "Complete: CRON Job turned off" && exit 0
